title: Talon Pickrate and Banrate
body: His banrate is suprisingly high in Ranked and his pickrate in normals is unbelievable. Anyone predict when all this will die down?

replies.body: Probably a nerf is given to him again. He is a new champ and has a pretty unique kit (jumping over walls like assassin's creed) which makes people want to play him even more because there is no champion like him lool. He would die out either when a nerf comes or when people get bored of him
when people realise that there are no longer pink wards :3
